'''''Domus Aurea Guide''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Rhapsodia in the Ancient Sea]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to follow six [[Seelie]] in the [[Nostoi Region]] and [[Sea of Bygone Eras]].
